title: Fourth Okaloosa County shooting victim grazed by bullet
content:
FORT WALTON BEACH, Fla. (WEAR) —
The Okaloosa County Sheriff's Office (OCSO) is investigating a shooting that injured four people outside an apartment complex on Lakeview Drive near Fort Walton Beach Thursday morning.
It was previously reported that three people had been wounded during the shooting.
Aaron Martinez, 21, Justin Redick, 21, and a 16-year-old female were hit by bullets but none of their injuries were life-threatening.
The girl was taken to Fort Walton Beach Medical center by an ambulance and Martinez and Redick showed up at the hospital later.
Investigators also learned a 17-year-old female was grazed by a bullet during the shooting, but decided not to seek medical attention.
